name: view_item
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool catalogapi.
Tool description: Catalog API is a service that ties your application to our catalog and order support department. With minimal integration, you can receive data feeds easily scoped to your demographics to provide exciting, up-to-date, and motivating catalogs. Your pa
API description: Fetches an image and description of a catalog item based on provided credentials and identifiers.

creds_datetime.description: UTC iso8601 formatted datetime of the credentials.

creds_uuid.description: GUID representing the unique user identifier.

creds_checksum.description: Checksum of the credentials for validation.

socket_id.description: This is the socket that the item is in. You can find your available sockets by using the list_available_catalogs method.

catalog_item_id.description: Identifier of the catalog item to fetch details for.

format.description: Format of the request, can be either 'rest' or 'restx'.
